options.systemMessage:
You are an effective inbound lead email agent. Your role is to research on the lead's business information and lead's problem statement to craft a personalized email to be sent to the leads with the goal of booking a meeting at www.calendly.com/book-now. Use a friendly tone which is welcoming and easy to read, clear call to action. 

#Tool
Use the Tavily tool to carry out online research that will help your email to the lead.
Use Pinecone Vector tool to refer to best brand guidelines and outbound practices

##Output
Output the email subject line and body in separated JSON Object forma.

üìß Automatic Personalized Sales Follow-Up with GPT-5, Pinecone, and Tavily Research
Description

Never let a lead go cold. This workflow automatically sends personalized follow-up emails to every inbound inquiry. It combines GPT-5 with Pinecone Vector DB and Tavily research to craft responses that align with your brand‚Äôs best practices, tone, and the latest product updates. Using embedded research tools, the workflow ensures each email is both timely and relevant‚Äîhelping your sales team convert more leads without manual effort.

üëâ Watch step-by-step build of workflows like these on: www.youtube.com/@automatewithmarc

How It Works

Form Trigger ‚Äì Captures inbound lead details (name, business, email, and message).

AI Sales Agent (GPT-5) ‚Äì Researches the lead‚Äôs business and problem statement, while referencing Pinecone for brand guidelines and product updates. Tavily research is used to enrich responses with the latest context.

Structured Output Parser ‚Äì Ensures the subject line and email body are generated in a clean JSON format.

Gmail Node (Send Follow-Up Email) ‚Äì Sends a polished, ready-to-go follow-up email to the lead.

Simple Memory ‚Äì Maintains continuity across follow-ups for a more natural conversation.

Why Sales Teams Will Love It

‚è± Faster responses ‚Äî no waiting, leads get an immediate follow-up.

üìù On-brand every time ‚Äî Pinecone ensures tone matches your sales playbook.

üåç Research-driven ‚Äî Tavily provides real-time enrichment for context-aware emails.

üìà Improves conversions ‚Äî timely, personalized outreach increases meeting bookings.

ü§ñ Hands-off automation ‚Äî sales reps can focus on closing, not chasing.

Setup Instructions

Form Trigger ‚Äì Configure your inbound form to capture lead details (name, email, company, message). Connect it to this workflow.

Pinecone Setup

Create a Pinecone index and embed your brand guidelines, sales playbook, and product updates.

Update the Pinecone Vector Store node with your index name.

Tavily Setup

Add your Tavily API key to the Perplexity/Tavily tool node.

OpenAI Setup

Add your OpenAI API key to the GPT-5 Chat Model node.

Adjust system prompts in the AI Agent node to reflect your company‚Äôs style.

Gmail Node

Connect your Gmail account to the ‚ÄúSend Follow-Up Email‚Äù node.

Update sender details if you want the email to come from a shared inbox or a rep‚Äôs account.

Customization

Adjust the system prompt inside the AI Agent to fit your tone (e.g., more casual vs. professional).

Update the meeting link (currently Calendly) to your own scheduling tool.

Add or remove form fields depending on the information you collect from leads.

Requirements

Gmail account (for sending follow-up emails)

OpenAI API key (GPT-5)

Pinecone account (to store/retrieve style guidelines + product updates)

Tavily API key (for online research enrichment)
